title: Quarterly average daily rate of hotels in Barcelona 2010 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in euros on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 8 groups 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in euros for both 2011 and 2010 have lowered.
Out of all 8 groups, 2015 had the highest Average daily rate in euros in Quarter Q3 and 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in euros in Quarter Q4.
In Quarter Q3, 2011 had the highest Average daily rate in euros among all 4 Quarters and it has the lowest Average daily rate in euros in Quarter Q1.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in euros on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 8 groups 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2011 and 2010. In both cases, the Average daily rate in euros have lowered.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in euros on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 8 groups 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in euros for both 2011 and 2010 have lowered.
Out of all 8 groups, 2015 had the highest Average daily rate in euros in Quarter Q3 and 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in euros in Quarter Q4.
In Quarter Q3, 2011 had the highest Average daily rate in euros among all 4 Quarters and it has the lowest Average daily rate in euros in Quarter Q1.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in euros on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 8 groups 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2011 and 2010. In both cases, the Average daily rate in euros have lowered.
Out of all 8 groups, 2015 had the highest Average daily rate in euros in Quarter Q3 and 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in euros in Quarter Q4.
Among all the Quarters, 2011 had the highest Average daily rate in euros 161.0 in Quarter Q3 and lowest value 121.0 in Quarter Q1.
The maximum Average daily rate in euros for 2011 that was found in Quarter Q3 was 1.33 times larger than the minimum Average daily rate in euros observed in Quarter Q1.
Out of all 8 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Average daily rate in euros was found in case of 2011.
2015 had the maximum Average daily rate in euros out of all 8 groups in Quarter Q3 followed by 2015 in Q3, and the minimum Average daily rate in euros is found for 2017 in Q4.
Averaging all 8 groups 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017, the Quarter Q1 is the maximum Average daily rate in euros and Q4 is the minimum Average daily rate in euros.
